name: Kilmert
description: How far would you go to find family in trouble? Follow Kilmert's journey to escape thugs, cops and ... cats... as he tries to find and save his older brother from being captured for a crime he did not commit! Maybe you will help Kilmert complete his life long mission in the progress! Play in the browser (instructions in "README .txt" provided with purchase) or pick up an emulator (google to find one that fits your desired device) and jump, shoot, and collect your way to help Kilmert complete his quest in this wacky action platformer.
